Node.js Child Process Exec

Descripción

Execute a shell command using child_process.exec


File Template: ❌


Prefix

node:child:exec


Scopes

javascript


Snippet de código

import { exec } from 'child_process';
exec('${1:command}', (error, stdout, stderr) => {
	if (error) {
		console.error(`Error: ${error.message}`);
		return;
	}
	if (stderr) {
		console.error(`Stderr: ${stderr}`);
		return;
	}
	console.log(`Stdout: ${stdout}`);
});
